addItem((string,string,string)).notice: Add an item with author, title and url until NUM_ITEMS exist, then switch to ranking phase

userdoc.notice: 5 items, 10 players. Each ranking costs 0.001 ETH.         When 10th player submits, contract:           1) Calculates cumulative ranking (Borda count)           2) Finds player(s) closest to final order           3) Splits and pays prize pool           4) Resets for next round
